structure.unit: ARTICLE LXXXVII. AIRCRAFT NOISE ABATEMENT TASK FORCE FOR OPA-LOCKA EXECUTIVE AIRPORT

text.section:
Sec. 2-1272. Purpose.
The purpose of the Task Force is to discuss, evaluate and recommend to the Miami-Dade Aviation Department ("MDAD") alternatives to reduce or mitigate aircraft noise impact on the areas surrounding Opa-locka Executive Airport ("OPF").
